resources:
About Absent Add Add Subject Additional settings Adjust card corner radius All months data You are using the latest version App Self Attendance Attendance Auto update Back button Backup Backup all data Backup & restore Backup app database Backup date Backup failed Backup found Backup app settings Backup successful Backup time Behavior Calendar Cancel Changelogs Added fully native Dark Mode support with system follow option.
Fixed UI padding across all screens for a more balanced look.
Implemented a modern Card Based UI for better content organization.
Enhanced accessibility and smooth animations. Added Class Timetable Notifications Feature! 
Get notified exactly when your class is scheduled to start.
Reliable alarms even when app is closed.
Mark attendance directly from notification (Attended/Missed).
Fixed various bugs and improved performance. Fixed some color values in color palette selection
Fixed some UI margins
Added prerelease build update checker Improved color scheme in high contrast dark theme
Added what's new bottomsheet to show changelogs after an update
Code optimisations Added behavior settings to modify certain app behavior
Added option to remember the last viewed month
Added option to turn off attendance streak visuals in calendar Switched some UI components to material expressive theme
Added option to make Monday as first day of the week in the Calendar
Added option to directly download the latest updated apk inside the app without the need to visit the Github repository
Fixed many UI inconsistencies Added option to backup and restore app data locally
Localised hardcoded strings
Minor ui improvements Fixed an issue where restoring backup failed in some devices Added notification alerts for various events like attendance reminder, missed attendance alert and notification alert when new version of the app is detected
Improved the batch selection of subject cards in home screen with support to dismiss selection by back press
Fixed system bars colors in android 11 and below Added warning before downloading app updates from Github
Fixed some icons in the app UI Revamped whole settings UI.
Added background cards to settings items Fixed card colors in dynamic theming Fixed some UI margins Updated dependencies and fixed some issues Initial release
Added calendar to mark attendance status
Added per subject progress display
Added ability to add, remove and edit subjects
Added settings for customising user experience Check updates Clear Confirm Current version Customisation Daily reminder to mark attendance Dark theme Choose between light, dark, or system theme Default language Are you sure you want to delete this? Delete Subject Contributors and support You might have forgot to mark your attendance today! Check for updates automatically Backup all data of the app Backup and restore app settings and other data Backup app database which includes the subjects data including their attendance records Backup app settings preferences only Modify certain behavior of the app History of all the changes made to the app Customise certain UI elements to your liking Change the default language of the app Automatically set the app theme according to the device wallpaper When turned on, updates will be downloaded directly from Github inside the app. Turn off to visit the Github releases page for manual download instead. If you have any ideas or suggestions for the app, let us know Visit the github repository of the app Do you want to get alerts when you forget to mark your attendance?

Grant notification access! Interactive haptics for touch feedback Pitch black dark theme for devices with OLED display Just a guy who loves apps and design Learn about the license this app is using Dynamic color, Dark theme, Language Don't forget to mark your attendance today! Customise notification settings of the app Receive notifications when an attendance is missed Receive notifications when a newer version of Driftly is released Turn on this option to remember the last viewed month for every subject Receive a daily notification to remind you to mark your attendance Report any issue or bug you have encountered while using the app Reset app settings to default values Restore app data from the saved backup file.
The saved database will overwrite the current database If enabled, attendance streaks will be shown on the calendar Prefer seeing your week begin with Monday instead of Sunday? Enable this to shift the calendar layout so Monday becomes the first day of the week. A newer version of Driftly has been released! Last backup date Last backup time Latest version Lead developer License Look & Feel Mark your attendance Month Network error Next month No attendance yet. Add some to view progress No changelog found for this version Click on the + button to add a subject" Notifications Notify missed attendance Notify when update available Off OK On Please pick a file with .driftly extension Pre-release Pre-release builds may be unstable These versions are still in testing and may contain unfinished features or unexpected bugs. If you choose to update to a pre-release, please be aware that things might break or behave strangely.
If you encounter any issues, crashes, or weird behavior, please report them so we can fix and improve Driftly before the stable release.
Thanks for helping us build better! Update Update available ! Update channel Update Subject Updates Version Click on the download button to get the latest version of Driftly from the github repository. Warning You're about to download updates directly from GitHub. Unlike updates from app stores, these are not reviewed for security. Do you want to continue? What's new!
